allow:
Bash(# Process all files with namespace declarations
files=(
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/AdvanceTimeCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/CommandExecutor.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/CompositeCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/DeliverLetterCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/IGameCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/LetterQueueActionCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/MarketTradeCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/ModifyInventoryCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/ModifyInventoryCommandV2.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/SpendCoinsCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/SpendStaminaCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/UpdateNPCRelationshipCommand.cs""
""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/VisitLocationCommand.cs""
)

for file in ""${files[@]}""; do
    echo ""Processing: $file""
    # Remove namespace line
    sed -i ''/^namespace.*[;{]$/d'' ""$file""
done)

Bash(# Create a Python script to handle this properly
cat > /tmp/remove_namespaces.py << ''EOF''
import os
import re

files = [
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/AdvanceTimeCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/CommandExecutor.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/CompositeCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/DeliverLetterCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/IGameCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/LetterQueueActionCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/MarketTradeCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/ModifyInventoryCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/ModifyInventoryCommandV2.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/SpendCoinsCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/SpendStaminaCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/UpdateNPCRelationshipCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Commands/VisitLocationCommand.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/DayTransitionHandlers/LetterQueueHandler.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/DayTransitionHandlers/MorningActivitiesHandler.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/DayTransitionHandlers/SaveGameHandler.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Extensions/StringExtensions.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/AddLetterToQueueOperation.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/AdvanceTimeOperation.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/InventoryOperations.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/LocationStateOperations.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/ModifyStaminaOperation.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/NPCStateOperations.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/PlayerStateOperations.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/RemoveLetterFromQueueOperation.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/SpendCoinsOperation.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Operations/SpendTokensOperation.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/StateContainers/ExtendedPlayerState.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/StateContainers/InventoryState.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/StateContainers/LocationState.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/StateContainers/NPCState.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/StateContainers/PlayerResourceState.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/StateContainers/TimeState.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/TimeEffects/LocationChangeEffect.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/TimeEffects/StaminaCostEffect.cs"",
    ""/mnt/c/git/wayfarer/src/GameState/Validation/GameStateValidator.cs""
]

for file_path in files:
    if os.path.exists(file_path):
        print(f""Processing: {file_path}"")
        with open(file_path, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
            lines = f.readlines()
        
        # Filter out namespace lines
        new_lines = []
        for line in lines:
            if not re.match(r''^namespace\s+.*[;{]\s*$'', line.strip()):
                new_lines.append(line)
        
        with open(file_path, ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
            f.writelines(new_lines)
        print(f""  Removed namespace declaration"")

print(""Done!"")
EOF

python3 /tmp/remove_namespaces.py)
